definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Get tips for smelling wine aromas in this free video from a wine sommelier.
sentences.chinese: 找聞此免費視頻從一個葡萄酒品酒師酒的芳香小技巧。

sentences.english: He is also among the first Japanese Sake Sommeliers in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 陳銘基先生同時是香港首批日本清酒品酒師。

sentences.english: Learn more about sangiovese wines in this free wine tasting video.
sentences.chinese: 桑嬌維塞葡萄酒更瞭解有關在此免費品酒視頻。
對於非品酒師，一切都是柔和的。

sentences.english: Smelling wine is important in wine tastings.
Every wine connoisseur will be delighted by its long, intensive finish.
sentences.chinese: 每個品酒鑑定家會因它悠久且強烈的回味而高興。

sentences.english: Fill in the glass about one third.
sentences.chinese: 品酒時應裝滿約三分之一玻璃杯。

sentences.english: At a wine merchant's warehouse, the regular taster died, and the director started looking for a new one to hire.
sentences.chinese: 有個紅酒商倉庫的品酒師死了，老總開始招聘新酒師。

sentences.english: It was she who first introduced me to the pleasures of wine- tasting.
sentences.chinese: 是她第一個讓我領略到參加品酒會的樂趣。

sentences.english: The menu de dégustation is the finest expression of avantgarde cooking.
sentences.chinese: 德品酒的菜單是前衛烹飪最好的表達。

sentences.english: Besides, liquor tasting results showed that the aroma and the taste of monascus base liquor got improved evidently.
sentences.chinese: 品酒結果表明，紅曲基酒的香氣和口味得到明顯改善。

sentences.english: On Sept 26th, 2005, Spring was invited to attend the mescal party held by Mexico Consulate Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 劉春泉律師出席墨西哥龍舌蘭酒品酒及推廣會。

sentences.english: Experts in viticulture and enology from Switzerland visited the college.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士葡萄酒專家來院交流並參觀學院品酒室。

sentences.english: If you Register on Drin Ke website will become Drin Ke Member.
sentences.chinese: 在品酒客註冊即可成爲品酒客會員。

sentences.english: If you Register on Drin Ke website will become Drin Ke Member.
sentences.chinese: 在品酒客註冊即可成爲品酒客會員。

sentences.english: Learn more about tempranillo wines in this free wine tasting video.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解更多關於普蘭尼洛在這個自由葡萄酒品酒視頻。

definition: to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
